channel.title: iPhone Apps?
channel.description: I've been looking into making iPhone apps, I have a really good idea on one that would be really useful to people but I don't know how hard it would be to make. I have no idea how to make one, what the requirements are, if I need any money for it, or what the risks are. So if any of you have any info on this topic please share? :)

item.title: iPhone Apps?
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

Isn’t there something called oDesk where I can pay people to make my app for me and then sell it? I saw it on YouTube and it looks useful.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone Apps?
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

I actually looked into it before.
C, $99.
Sometimes they make it free for short times, though.

Read full topic

<Pure_> Objective-C
<Pure_> you must purchase a 99$ suite from apple
<Pure_> to publish apps
<Pure_> and you need something with MAC OS X
